params._amount: The amount required to fund this tier.
params._name: The name of the funding tier.

params._additionalDays: The number of additional days to extend the deadline.

fund(uint256).details: This function can only be called before the campaign deadline.

params._tierIndex: The index of the funding tier to check.

getCampaignStatus().details: It returns the status based on the current time and balance.

getCampaignStatusRow().details: It returns the status as it is without any modifications.

params._index: The index of the funding tier to view.

getIsPaused().details: It returns the pause state of the contract.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

refund().details: This function can only be called by backers who have contributed to the campaign.

params._index: The index of the funding tier to remove.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

togglePause().details: This function can only be called by the owner of the contract.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

withdraw().details: This function can only be called by the owner of the contract.

addTier(string,uint256).notice: This function allows the owner to add a new funding tier to the campaign.

extendCampaignDeadline(uint256).notice: This function allows the owner to extend the campaign deadline.

fund(uint256).notice: This function allows users to fund the campaign.

getBackerAmount(address).notice: This function allows users to view the total contribution made by a specific backer.

getBackerHasFundedTier(address,uint256).notice: This function allows users to check if a specific backer has funded a particular tier.

getCampaignBalance().notice: This function allows users to view the current balance of the campaign.

getCampaignDeadline().notice: This function allows users to view the campaign deadline.

getCampaignDescription().notice: This function allows users to view the campaign description.

getCampaignGoal().notice: This function allows users to view the campaign goal.

getCampaignName().notice: This function allows users to view the campaign name.

getCampaignStatus().notice: This function allows users to check the current status of the campaign.

getCampaignStatusRow().notice: This function allows users to view the current status of the campaign.

getFundingTierInfo(uint256).notice: This function allows users to view information about a specific funding tier.

getFundingTiers().notice: This function allows users to view the different funding tiers for the campaign.

getIsPaused().notice: This function allows users to check if the campaign is paused.

getTierCount().notice: This function allows users to view the total number of funding tiers.

refund().notice: This function allows backers to refund their contributions if the campaign has failed.

removeTier(uint256).notice: This function allows the owner to remove a funding tier from the campaign.

togglePause().notice: This function allows the owner to pause or unpause the campaign.

withdraw().notice: This function allows the owner to withdraw funds from the campaign.
